lead_paragraph: Ilya Kovalchuk scored his 400th career goal, and the backup goalie Johan Hedberg made it stand up in the Devils’ 1-0 victory over the Ottawa Senators.
snippet: Ilya Kovalchuk scored his 400th career goal, and the backup goalie Johan Hedberg made it stand up in the Devils’ 1-0 victory over the Ottawa Senators.
